channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft buys another 100 MW of solar, this time in Japan
item.description: The new deal covers output from four different solar projects. Microsoft has said it will spend $2.9 billion to expand its infrastructure in Japan.

item.title: OpenAI Wants ChatGPT to Be Your Future Operating System
item.description: At OpenAI’s Developer Day, CEO Sam Altman showed off apps that run entirely inside the chat window—a new effort to turn ChatGPT into a platform.

item.title: Lucid Motors sets record as Gravity sales pick up and tax credit expires
item.description: The company has seen EV deliveries increase for seven straight quarters, even though it's still way off the ambitious goals it promoted when it went p...

item.title: OpenAI ramps up developer push with more powerful models in its API
item.description: The updates were part of a series of announcements geared toward wooing developers to OpenAI’s ecosystem, including the launch of an agent-building to...

item.title: Taking These 50 Objects Out of Orbit Would Cut Danger From Space Junk in Half
item.description: Old rocket parts and decommissioned satellites are whizzing around in low Earth orbit, where they risk colliding with the ever-growing constellations ...

item.title: OpenAI's Blockbuster AMD Deal Is a Bet on Near-Limitless Demand for AI
item.description: OpenAI’s latest move in the race to build massive data centers in the US shows it believes demand for AI will keep surging—even as skeptics warn of a ...

item.title: Taylor Swift fans accuse singer of using AI in her Google scavenger hunt videos
item.description: Swifties love a puzzle, but some were rubbed the wrong way by a promotional scavenger hunt which appeared to use AI-generated videos.

item.title: This 16-Inch Laptop Just Won Best Buy's Techtober Sale
item.description: This Acer laptop just won Best Buy's Techtober sales event, sporting remarkably high specs for the price.

item.title: MrBeast says AI could threaten creators’ livelihoods, calling it ‘scary times’ for the industry
item.description: If MrBeast is openly questioning whether AI is an existential threat to his business and others like it, then it's fair to say that smaller creators a...

item.title: WIRED Roundup: The New Fake World of OpenAI’s Social Video App
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we break down some of the week's best stories, covering everything from Peter Thiel's obsession with the Antichrist...
